title: Analyst who forecast Nvidia stock could exceed $750 revamps target
text:
Artificial-intelligence spending has caused Nvidia's share price to surge as investors model for ever-growing demand for its semiconductor chips. Nvidia's position as the leading provider of chips specially designed to train and run AI applications has resulted in eye-popping sales and profit growth. As a result, Nvidia's stock has risen by 243% in the past year and 60% year-to-date. Javascript is required for you to be able to read premium content. Please enable it in your browser settings.
